TopicTitle: How do you embed an Imgur album on the forums?

Articles.Content:
I know how to embed photos just not an album! It would help me a lot.

Edited November 26, 2014 by DMSP

Take your imgur album link, for example http://imgur.com/a/dkuU1

Then include the album's ID within [ imgur ] [/ imgur ] tags: [ imgur ]dkuU1[/ imgur ]

just leave away the spaces from [ imgur ], then it will be embedded in the forum

I just figured it out VIA http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums!

Thanks for helping!
